template.name: Example template
template.body:
You can save templates for use when you are sending messages with similar content on a regular basis.

 If you set a template to be 'golbal' this means other employees will be able to use it and it will appear in their list. 

 To create a template simply type the template like you would a normal message and click the 'Create Template' button, give your template a name and it will then appear in the template drop down list for future use.
